card_text: 2+ Level 3 monsters$NOnce per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by battle until the end of your opponent's turn. Once per turn, after damage calculation, if this card battled an opponent's monster, while you have 2 or more monsters in your GY with the same original Type and Attribute as each other: You can banish that opponent's monster.
